name: Bachelor of Game Design Holiday Card 2016 | Sheridan
name_original: Bachelor of Game Design Holiday Card 2016 | Sheridan
description:
How To Play

Move -> arrow keys

Cut Ice -> hold the C key

Cut the ice to create holes to dunk the bears and earn points! Just don't dunk yourself!

Earn Prizes (only for the 2016 holiday season)

By tweeting and/or sharing your score @SheridanCollege, you'll be entered into a raffle hosted by Sheridan College!
